pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Flexible Color Scale for Ternary Compositions // Compositional data consisting of three-parts can be color mapped with a ternary color scale. Such a scale is provided by the tricolore packages with options for discrete and continuous colors, mean- centering and scaling. See Jonas Schley (2021) "The centered ternary balance scheme. A technique to visualize surfaces of unbalanced three-part compositions" doi:10.4054/DemRes.2021.44.19, Jonas Schley, Frans Willekens (2017) "Visualizing compositional data on the Lexis surface" doi:10.4054/DemRes.2017.36.21, and Ilya Kashnitsky, Jonas Schley (2018) "Regional population structures at a glance" doi:10.1016/S0140-6736(18)31194-2.
